mean_cn: vt. 打发走，把（外国人）驱逐出境
mean_en: to force somebody to leave a country, usually because they have broken the law or because they have no legal right to be there
sentence: The tiger is being deported to his homeland because he broke the law.
sentence_trans: 老虎因触犯法律而被遣送回国。
word_etyma: de去掉 + port拿，运 → 拿出来 → 移送，放逐
